headline: Bull of the Day: Philip Morris Intl (PM)
summary: Philip Moriss is strategically evolving beyond its traditional cigarette business, exemplified by the remarkable success of its "Zyn" oral nicotine patch.

headline: ZYN and IQOS Scale Up: Is Philip Morris Leading the Industry Reset?
summary: PM sees smoke-free products drive 44% of Q1 profit as ZYN and IQOS momentum redefines its future beyond tobacco.
